name_hebrew: מרק סמיך חמוץ וחריף של בינה
name_english: Thick Sour and Spicy Soup of Bina
instructions: Combine all the ingredients in a pot and cook over low heat, stirring well.
After about 20 minutes, prepare a roux by mixing water and flour, and gradually add it to the soup while stirring.
Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed.
notes: This traditional Tunisian-Djerban Jewish soup is known for its unique blend of sour and spicy flavors, making it a comforting dish perfect for any occasion.
